title: Requires all 5 year olds as of December 1, 2015 to attend kindergarten unless in non-public schools
summary: Requires all 5 year olds as of December 1, 2015 to attend kindergarten unless in non-public schools.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2293

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CLARK -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to attendance of minors

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  3205 of the education law is amended by adding a
    2  new subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4. COMMENCING  DECEMBER  FIRST,  TWO  THOUSAND  FIFTEEN,  EACH  SCHOOL
    4  DISTRICT  OF  THE  STATE  IS HEREBY AUTHORIZED TO REQUIRE MINORS WHO ARE
    5  FIVE YEARS OF AGE ON OR BEFORE DECEMBER  FIRST  TO  ATTEND  KINDERGARTEN
    6  INSTRUCTION  FROM  THE FIRST DAY THAT THE APPROPRIATE PUBLIC SCHOOLS ARE
    7  IN SESSION IN SEPTEMBER OF SUCH SCHOOL YEAR, AND  A  MINOR  WHO  BECOMES
    8  FIVE  YEARS  OF AGE AFTER THE FIRST OF DECEMBER IN ANY SCHOOL YEAR SHALL
    9  BE REQUIRED TO ATTEND KINDERGARTEN FROM THE FIRST DAY OF SESSION IN  THE
   10  FOLLOWING  SEPTEMBER.  HOWEVER  THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SUBDIVISION SHALL
   11  NOT APPLY TO STUDENTS ENROLLED IN NON-PUBLIC SCHOOLS OR IN HOME INSTRUC-
   12  TION.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06546-01-1
